data.question: What is the chemical formula of CUB-5?
What method was used for the gas adsorption measurements of CUB-5?
data.answer: Volumetric method using a Micromeritics ASAP 2040 instrument

data.question: At what temperature was CUB-5 activated before gas adsorption measurements?
What was the yield of CUB-5 synthesis?
What is the space group of CUB-5?
How was the moisture sensitivity of CUB-5 studied?
data.answer: By exposing the MOF to humid environments of either 33% or 75% relative humidity and subsequent structural analysis using powder X-ray diffraction

data.question: What was the result of exposing CUB-5 to 75% humidity?
data.answer: CUB-5 underwent a phase transition similar to that observed in MOF-5 after exposure to moisture

data.question: Is CUB-5 more moisture sensitive than MOF-5?
What simulation method was used to evaluate the adsorption performance of CUB-5?
Did the study find that CUB-5 has a potential for benzene separation applications?
What was used to calculate static binding energies for guest molecules in CUB-5?
data.answer: Density functional theory (DFT) using the DFT-D3 method

data.question: Was disorder observed in the crystal structure of CUB-5?
What technique was used to investigate the porosity within the CUB-5 framework?
What was the main reason for the poor quality of the crystal data for CUB-5?
data.answer: Extensive streaking in the diffraction images due to diffuse reflectance

data.question: Did the synthesis of CUB-5 require moisture-free conditions?
What was the main purpose of using DFT calculations in the study?
data.answer: To accurately estimate static binding energies for guest molecules with the CUB-5 framework

data.question: Was the disorder in the structure of CUB-5 due to crystallographically imposed symmetry?
What was the main finding from the Positron Annihilation Lifetime Spectroscopy of CUB-5?
data.answer: The lifetimes are an average value of the void spaces as the positrons travel through thousands of unit cells

data.question: Was the thermal stability of CUB-5 analyzed using thermogravimetric analysis?
What was the main challenge in obtaining high-quality crystal data for CUB-5?
data.answer: The extensive disorder in the structure, including the Zn4O clusters and the cubane backbones of the carboxylate ligands
